sentence.text: In addition, reduced hair follicles (HFs) while the enlarged and increased number of sebaceous glands (SGs) were also found in the anatomical structure morphogenesis<sup>-/-</sup> rabbits, showing that the disrupted balance between HFs and SGs may respond to hypotrichosis of ECTD-9 in an animal model and clinically.

Here, the homozygous anatomical structure morphogenesis<sup>-/-</sup> rabbits showed complete loss of hair on the head and dorsum, whereas hypotrichosis in the limbs and tail were determined in the Hoxc13<sup>-/-</sup> rabbits.
